QueryToExecute:
select
  arn as resource,
  case
    when vpc_id is null or vpc_id = '' then 'alarm'
    else 'ok'
  end status,
  case
    when vpc_id is null or vpc_id = '' then title || ' is not in VPC.'
    else title || ' is in VPC ' || vpc_id || '.'
  end reason
  
  , region, account_id
from
  aws_lambda_function;
